oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Khrushchev could eat. We can't.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: African American woman carrying protest sign in front of Rich's Department Store, Chattanooga. Sign reads "Khrushchev could eat. We can't!"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African Americans
Women; Civil rights demonstrations; Signs (Notices); Department Stores
